summary: Implemented a shared error-to-message formatter and updated visit entry create/edit flows to catch backend/client errors and surface sanitized English messages. Added integer-only validation for hospital/medicine charges to avoid BigInt conversion errors. However, the diff also includes unrelated UI/theme changes and import dialog enhancements that were not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Changed global UI/theme styling (calm clinical color palette tokens, chart colors) in global CSS.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly scopes to fixing save error handling; UI theme/navigation redesign is a non-goal. The diff summary indicates global theme changes unrelated to save flow.
evidence: frontend/src/index.css (mentioned in frontend-file-summaries.txt as modified with new palette/tokens)

hallucinated_features.description: Enhanced CSV import flow with per-entry error details, integer conversion/validation before BigInt conversion, and additional toast messaging.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest focuses on the New Visit Entry save flow and create/edit mutation error propagation; import workflow changes were not requested.
